traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the paeliryon's darkvision.

traits.name: Keen Eyes
entries: The paeliryon scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The paeliryon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The paeliryon makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with Draining Grasp (if available).

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Draining Grasp {@recharge 4}
entries: The paeliryon makes a Claw attack. On a hit, the target's Charisma score is reduced by 2 ({@dice 1d4}). This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. A creature whose Charisma is reduced to 3 or less because of this ability, has the {@condition stunned} condition for 1 minute.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The paeliryon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):
